channel.title: Rights Help
channel.description:
Hey. ive made a code to kill people if i want to, and ive made it so only my username can do it ...
if (command.startsWith("eat") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("the hidd3n") { and that compiles fine but when i try to add a second username
if (command.startsWith("eat") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("the hidd3n") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("your remains") { i get all sorts of errors
what am i doing wrong?

item.title: Rights Help
item.dc:creator: @dunea dunea
item.description:
@dunea wrote:

if (command.startsWith("eat") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("the hidd3n") || && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("your remains") {

Happy?

That…was the simplest error i ever fixed…looooooool.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Generalscape wrote:

don’t be too much of yourself dunea, but yes. I was about to suggest what ^ said.

item.title: Rights Help
item.dc:creator: @dunea dunea
item.description:
@dunea wrote:

If he only wants it him he can just be using the player rights 3 and no one else number 3…I should go back to R-server instead of helping noobs here.

Read full topic

item.title: Rights Help
item.dc:creator: @erko321 erko321
item.description:
@erko321 wrote:

he wants it so only him and some1 else can use a specified code the first code works but second doesnt try creating another command for your friend

if (command.startsWith("eat") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("the hidd3n") {
if (command.startsWith("eat") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("your remains") {

Read full topic

item.title: Rights Help
item.dc:creator: @dunea dunea
item.description:
@dunea wrote:

After the if (command.startswith("eat") Add this to end if you want just owner to use or co-owner or secret owner && playerRights >= 2) {

like this if (command.startswith("eat") && playerRights >= 2) {

Read full topic

item.title: Rights Help
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

Hey.
ive made a code to kill people if i want to, and ive made it so only my username can do it …

if (command.startsWith(“eat”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“the hidd3n”) {
and that compiles fine but when i try to add a second username

if (command.startsWith(“eat”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“the hidd3n”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“your remains”) {
i get all sorts of errors

what am i doing wrong?

Read full topic
